General.Name: Thitikorn Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thitikorn Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides motorcycle and automobile hire-purchase, and other related services for general retail customers in Thailand. It also offers personal and other loans, and nano finance/microfinance services, as well as vehicle modification services. In addition, the company engages in the non-life insurance brokerage business. Thitikorn Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
